variable.name: param
variable.expression: groovyScript("def result=''; def stop=false; def params=\"${_1}\".replaceAll('[\\\\[|\\\\]|\\\\s]', '').split(',').toList(); if (params.size()==1 && (params[0]==null || params[0]=='null' || params[0]=='')) { stop=true; }; if(!stop) { for(i=0; i < params.size(); i++) {result +=((i==0) ? '\\r\\n' : '') + ((i < params.size() - 1) ? ' * @param: ' + params[i] + '\\r\\n' : ' * @param: ' + params[i] + '')}; }; return result;", methodParameters())

variable.name: return
variable.expression: groovyScript("def result=''; def data=\"${_1}\"; def stop=false; if(data==null || data=='null' || data=='' || data=='void' ) { stop=true; }; if(!stop) { result += '\\r\\n' + ' * @return: ' + data; }; return result;", methodReturnType())
